H0.text: Who were the first ever winners of the FA Cup, in 1872. Royal Engineers

H1.text: Who were the first ever winners of the FA Cup, in 1872. Crystal Palace

H2.text: Who were the first ever winners of the FA Cup, in 1872. Hampstead Heathens

H3.text: Who were the first ever winners of the FA Cup, in 1872. Wanderer

A4.text: Wanderers won the inaugural Football Association Challenge Cup (now known as the FA Cup) in 1872.

A5.text: The club beat the Royal Engineers 1â€“0 to become the first ever winners of the cup.
